text: The Ordeal of Rosetta is a 1918 American silent drama film directed by Emile Chautard and starring Alice Brady, Crauford Kent and Ormi Hawley.Bertellini p.233 ==Cast== * Alice Brady as Rosetta / Lola Gelardi (twins) * Crauford Kent as Aubrey Hapgood * Ormi Hawley as Ruth Hapgood * Henry Leone as Professor Gelardi * Maude Turner Gordon as Mrs. Hapgood * Hazel Washburn as Mildred Sanders * Edmund Burns as Dick * George Henry as Theatrical Agent ==References== ==Bibliography== * Giorgio Bertellini. Italy in Early American Cinema: Race, Landscape, and the Picturesque. Indiana University Press, 2010. ==External links== * Category:1918 films Category:1918 drama films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by Emile Chautard Category:American silent feature films Category:English- language films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Selznick Pictures films
title: The Ordeal of Rosetta
